To make this decision, I need to carefully weigh the pros and cons of each option:

Upgrading existing infrastructure:

- Benefits existing riders immediately
- Lower risk as it builds on established system

New autonomous vehicle service:

- May attract new riders and reduce car usage
- Potential for greater efficiency

- Unproven technology with higher risk

This will provide immediate benefits to current transit users and improve the reliability and efficiency of the system that is already in place. While autonomous vehicles are promising, the technology is still developing and comes with more risks and uncertainties. The existing system serves as the backbone of public transit, so ensuring it is in good working order should take precedence.
